verses.text: \w Now|strong="G1161"\w* concerning the \w things|strong="G4012"\w* \w whereof|strong="G3739"\w* ye \w wrote|strong="G1125"\w* unto \w me|strong="G3427"\w*: \add It is\add* \w good|strong="G2570"\w* for a \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* to \w touch|strong="G0680"\w* a \w woman|strong="G1135"\w*.

\w Nevertheless|strong="G1161"\w*, \add to avoid\add* \w fornication|strong="G4202"\w*, let every \w man|strong="G1538"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* his \w own|strong="G1438"\w* \w wife|strong="G1135"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* let every \w woman|strong="G1538"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* her \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \w husband|strong="G0435"\w*.

Let the \w husband|strong="G0435"\w* \w render|strong="G0591"\w* unto the \w wife|strong="G1135"\w* \w due|strong="G3784"\w* \w benevolence|strong="G2133"\w*: \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w likewise|strong="G3668"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* the \w wife|strong="G1135"\w* unto the \w husband|strong="G0435"\w*.

The \w wife|strong="G1135"\w* \w hath|strong="G1850"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w power|strong="G1850"\w* of her \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \w body|strong="G4983"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* the \w husband|strong="G0435"\w*: \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w likewise|strong="G3668"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* the \w husband|strong="G0435"\w* \w hath|strong="G1850"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w power|strong="G1850"\w* of his \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \w body|strong="G4983"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* the \w wife|strong="G1135"\w*.

Defraud \w ye|strong="G0650"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* one the \w other|strong="G0240"\w*, \w except|strong="G1487"\w* \add it be\add* \w with|strong="G1537"\w* \w consent|strong="G4859"\w* \w for|strong="G4314"\w* a \w time|strong="G2540"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* ye may give \w yourselves|strong="G4980"\w* to \w fasting|strong="G3521"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w prayer|strong="G4335"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* come \w together|strong="G4905"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w Satan|strong="G4567"\w* \w tempt|strong="G3985"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w incontinency|strong="G0192"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* I \w speak|strong="G3004"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* \w by|strong="G2596"\w* \w permission|strong="G4774"\w*, \add and\add* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w of|strong="G2596"\w* \w commandment|strong="G2003"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* I \w would|strong="G2309"\w* that \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w* \w were|strong="G1511"\w* \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* I \w myself|strong="G1683"\w*. \w But|strong="G0235"\w* every \w man|strong="G1538"\w* \w hath|strong="G2192"\w* \w his|strong="G2398"\w* proper \w gift|strong="G5486"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w one|strong="G3739"\w* after this \w manner|strong="G3779"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w another|strong="G3739"\w* after \w that|strong="G3779"\w*.

I \w say|strong="G3004"\w* \w therefore|strong="G1161"\w* to the \w unmarried|strong="G0022"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w widows|strong="G5503"\w*, It \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w good|strong="G2570"\w* for \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w if|strong="G1437"\w* they \w abide|strong="G3306"\w* \w even|strong="G5613"\w* as \w I|strong="G2504"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w they|strong="G1467"\w* \w cannot|strong="G3756"\w* \w contain|strong="G1467"\w*, let them \w marry|strong="G1060"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* it \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w better|strong="G2908"\w* to \w marry|strong="G1060"\w* \w than|strong="G2228"\w* to \w burn|strong="G4448"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* unto the \w married|strong="G1060"\w* I \w command|strong="G3853"\w*, \add yet\add* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, Let \w not|strong="G3361"\w* the \w wife|strong="G1135"\w* \w depart|strong="G5563"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \add her\add* \w husband|strong="G0435"\w*:

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w if|strong="G1437"\w* she \w depart|strong="G5563"\w*, let her \w remain|strong="G3306"\w* \w unmarried|strong="G0022"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* be \w reconciled|strong="G2644"\w* \w to|strong="G0435"\w* \add her\add* \w husband|strong="G0435"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w let|strong="G0435"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* the \w husband|strong="G0435"\w* put \w away|strong="G0863"\w* \add his\add* \w wife|strong="G1135"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* to the \w rest|strong="G3062"\w* \w speak|strong="G3004"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w*, \w not|strong="G3756"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*: \w If|strong="G1487"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w* \w hath|strong="G2192"\w* a \w wife|strong="G1135"\w* that believeth \w not|strong="G0571"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w she|strong="G0846"\w* be \w pleased|strong="G4909"\w* to \w dwell|strong="G3611"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, let \w him|strong="G0863"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w put|strong="G0863"\w* her \w away|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w woman|strong="G1135"\w* \w which|strong="G3748"\w* \w hath|strong="G2192"\w* an \w husband|strong="G0435"\w* that believeth \w not|strong="G0571"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* if \w he|strong="G0846"\w* be \w pleased|strong="G4909"\w* to \w dwell|strong="G3611"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w*, let \w her|strong="G0863"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w leave|strong="G0863"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* the \w unbelieving|strong="G0571"\w* \w husband|strong="G0435"\w* is \w sanctified|strong="G0037"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* the \w wife|strong="G1135"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w unbelieving|strong="G0571"\w* \w wife|strong="G1135"\w* is \w sanctified|strong="G0037"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* the \w husband|strong="G0435"\w*: \w else|strong="G1893"\w* \w were|strong="G2076"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w children|strong="G5043"\w* \w unclean|strong="G0169"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* are \w they|strong="G2076"\w* \w holy|strong="G0040"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* the \w unbelieving|strong="G0571"\w* \w depart|strong="G5563"\w*, let him \w depart|strong="G5563"\w*. A \w brother|strong="G0080"\w* \w or|strong="G2228"\w* a \w sister|strong="G0079"\w* \w is|strong="G3756"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* under \w bondage|strong="G1402"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w such|strong="G5108"\w* \add cases\add*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* hath \w called|strong="G2564"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* \w to|strong="G1722"\w* \w peace|strong="G1515"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* knowest \w thou|strong="G1492"\w*, O \w wife|strong="G1135"\w*, \w whether|strong="G1487"\w* thou shalt \w save|strong="G4982"\w* \add thy\add* \w husband|strong="G0435"\w*? \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w how|strong="G5101"\w* knowest \w thou|strong="G1492"\w*, O \w man|strong="G0435"\w*, \w whether|strong="G1487"\w* thou shalt \w save|strong="G4982"\w* \add thy\add* \w wife|strong="G1135"\w*?

\w But|strong="G1487"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* hath \w distributed|strong="G3307"\w* to every \w man|strong="G1538"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* hath \w called|strong="G2564"\w* every \w one|strong="G1538"\w*, \w so|strong="G3779"\w* let him \w walk|strong="G4043"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w so|strong="G3779"\w* ordain \w I|strong="G1299"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w churches|strong="G1577"\w*.

\w Is|strong="G2564"\w* any \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w called|strong="G2564"\w* being \w circumcised|strong="G4059"\w*? let \w him|strong="G1986"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* become \w uncircumcised|strong="G1986"\w*. \w Is|strong="G2564"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* \w called|strong="G2564"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w uncircumcision|strong="G0203"\w*? let \w him|strong="G4059"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* be \w circumcised|strong="G4059"\w*.

\w Circumcision|strong="G4061"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3762"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w uncircumcision|strong="G0203"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3762"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* the \w keeping|strong="G5084"\w* of the \w commandments|strong="G1785"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

Let every \w man|strong="G1538"\w* \w abide|strong="G3306"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w same|strong="G3778"\w* \w calling|strong="G2821"\w* \w wherein|strong="G1722"\w* he was \w called|strong="G2564"\w*.

Art thou \w called|strong="G2564"\w* \add being\add* a \w servant|strong="G1401"\w*? \w care|strong="G3199"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* for \w it|strong="G4671"\w*: \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* thou \w mayest|strong="G1410"\w* be \w made|strong="G1096"\w* \w free|strong="G1658"\w*, \w use|strong="G5530"\w* \add it\add* \w rather|strong="G3123"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* he \w that|strong="G3588"\w* is \w called|strong="G2564"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \add being\add* a \w servant|strong="G1401"\w*, \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w Lord’s|strong="G2962"\w* \w freeman|strong="G0558"\w*: \w likewise|strong="G3668"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* he \w that|strong="G3588"\w* is \w called|strong="G2564"\w*, \add being\add* \w free|strong="G1658"\w*, \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w Christ’s|strong="G5547"\w* \w servant|strong="G1401"\w*.

Ye are \w bought|strong="G0059"\w* with a \w price|strong="G5092"\w*; \w be|strong="G1096"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w ye|strong="G1096"\w* the \w servants|strong="G1401"\w* of \w men|strong="G0444"\w*.

\w Brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, let every \w man|strong="G1538"\w*, \w wherein|strong="G1722"\w* he is \w called|strong="G2564"\w*, \w therein|strong="G1722"\w* \w abide|strong="G3306"\w* \w with|strong="G3844"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w concerning|strong="G4012"\w* \w virgins|strong="G3933"\w* I \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w commandment|strong="G2003"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*: \w yet|strong="G1161"\w* I \w give|strong="G1325"\w* my \w judgment|strong="G1106"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* one that hath obtained \w mercy|strong="G1653"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* to \w be|strong="G1511"\w* \w faithful|strong="G4103"\w*.

I \w suppose|strong="G3543"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* that \w this|strong="G5124"\w* \w is|strong="G5225"\w* \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* the \w present|strong="G1764"\w* \w distress|strong="G0318"\w*, \add I say\add*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \add it is\add* \w good|strong="G2570"\w* for a \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w so|strong="G3779"\w* to \w be|strong="G1511"\w*.

Art thou \w bound|strong="G1210"\w* unto a \w wife|strong="G1135"\w*? \w seek|strong="G2212"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* to be \w loosed|strong="G3080"\w*. Art thou \w loosed|strong="G3089"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* a \w wife|strong="G1135"\w*? \w seek|strong="G2212"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* a \w wife|strong="G1135"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w if|strong="G1437"\w* thou \w marry|strong="G1060"\w*, thou \w hast|strong="G0264"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w sinned|strong="G0264"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w if|strong="G1437"\w* a \w virgin|strong="G3933"\w* \w marry|strong="G1060"\w*, she \w hath|strong="G0264"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w sinned|strong="G0264"\w*. \w Nevertheless|strong="G1161"\w* \w such|strong="G5108"\w* shall \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w trouble|strong="G2347"\w* in the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w spare|strong="G5339"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* I \w say|strong="G5346"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, the \w time|strong="G4958"\w* \add is\add* \w short|strong="G3588"\w*: it \w remaineth|strong="G2076"\w*, \w that|strong="G2532"\w* \w both|strong="G3588"\w* they \w that|strong="G2192"\w* \w have|strong="G1135"\w* \w wives|strong="G5613"\w* be \w as|strong="G3361"\w* \w though|strong="G5600"\w* they \w had|strong="G5600"\w* \w none|strong="G2192"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G3588"\w* that \w weep|strong="G2799"\w*, as \w though|strong="G5613"\w* they \w wept|strong="G2799"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G3588"\w* that \w rejoice|strong="G5463"\w*, as \w though|strong="G5613"\w* they \w rejoiced|strong="G5463"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G3588"\w* that \w buy|strong="G0059"\w*, as \w though|strong="G5613"\w* they \w possessed|strong="G2722"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G3588"\w* that \w use|strong="G5530"\w* \w this|strong="G5129"\w* \w world|strong="G2889"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w abusing|strong="G2710"\w* \add it\add*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* the \w fashion|strong="G4976"\w* of \w this|strong="G5127"\w* \w world|strong="G2889"\w* passeth \w away|strong="G3855"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* I would \w have|strong="G2309"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* without \w carefulness|strong="G0275"\w*. \w He|strong="G3588"\w* that \w is|strong="G1511"\w* \w unmarried|strong="G0022"\w* careth \w for|strong="G3309"\w* the \w things|strong="G3588"\w* that belong to the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w how|strong="G4459"\w* he may \w please|strong="G0700"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*:

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G3588"\w* that is \w married|strong="G1060"\w* careth \w for|strong="G3309"\w* the \w things|strong="G3588"\w* that are of the \w world|strong="G2889"\w*, \w how|strong="G4459"\w* he may \w please|strong="G0700"\w* \add his\add* \w wife|strong="G1135"\w*.

There is \w difference|strong="G3307"\w* \add also\add* \w between|strong="G3307"\w* a \w wife|strong="G1135"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* a \w virgin|strong="G3933"\w*. The \w unmarried|strong="G0022"\w* woman careth \w for|strong="G3309"\w* the \w things|strong="G3588"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* she may \w be|strong="G5600"\w* \w holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w both|strong="G2532"\w* in \w body|strong="G4983"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* in \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w she|strong="G3588"\w* that is \w married|strong="G1060"\w* careth \w for|strong="G3309"\w* the \w things|strong="G3588"\w* of the \w world|strong="G2889"\w*, \w how|strong="G4459"\w* she may \w please|strong="G0700"\w* \add her\add* \w husband|strong="G0435"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* I \w speak|strong="G3004"\w* \w for|strong="G4314"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w own|strong="G0846"\w* \w profit|strong="G4851"\w*; \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* I may \w cast|strong="G1911"\w* a \w snare|strong="G1029"\w* upon \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w for|strong="G4314"\w* that which is \w comely|strong="G2158"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* that ye may attend \w upon|strong="G2145"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* without \w distraction|strong="G0563"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* any \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w think|strong="G3543"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* he \w behaveth|strong="G0807"\w* \w himself|strong="G0846"\w* \w uncomely|strong="G0807"\w* \w toward|strong="G1909"\w* his \w virgin|strong="G3933"\w*, \w if|strong="G1437"\w* she \w pass|strong="G5600"\w* the flower \w of|strong="G5230"\w* \add her\add* \w age|strong="G5230"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w need|strong="G3784"\w* \w so|strong="G3779"\w* \w require|strong="G1096"\w*, let him \w do|strong="G4160"\w* what he \w will|strong="G2309"\w*, he \w sinneth|strong="G0264"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*: let them \w marry|strong="G1060"\w*.

\w Nevertheless|strong="G1161"\w* he \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w standeth|strong="G2476"\w* \w stedfast|strong="G1476"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* his \w heart|strong="G2588"\w*, \w having|strong="G2192"\w* \w no|strong="G3361"\w* \w necessity|strong="G0318"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w hath|strong="G2192"\w* \w power|strong="G1849"\w* \w over|strong="G4012"\w* his \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \w will|strong="G2307"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w hath|strong="G2919"\w* \w so|strong="G5124"\w* \w decreed|strong="G2919"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w heart|strong="G2588"\w* that he will \w keep|strong="G5083"\w* \w his|strong="G1438"\w* \w virgin|strong="G3933"\w*, \w doeth|strong="G4160"\w* \w well|strong="G2573"\w*.

\w So|strong="G5620"\w* \w then|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G3588"\w* that \w giveth|strong="G1547"\w* \add her\add* in \w marriage|strong="G1547"\w* \w doeth|strong="G4160"\w* \w well|strong="G2573"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G3588"\w* that \w giveth|strong="G1547"\w* \add her\add* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* in \w marriage|strong="G1547"\w* \w doeth|strong="G4160"\w* \w better|strong="G2908"\w*.

The \w wife|strong="G1135"\w* is \w bound|strong="G1210"\w* by the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w as|strong="G1909"\w* \w long|strong="G5550"\w* \w as|strong="G3745"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w husband|strong="G0435"\w* \w liveth|strong="G2198"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1437"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w husband|strong="G0435"\w* be \w dead|strong="G2837"\w*, she \w is|strong="G2076"\w* at \w liberty|strong="G1658"\w* to be married \w to|strong="G1060"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* she \w will|strong="G2309"\w*; \w only|strong="G3440"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* she \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w happier|strong="G3107"\w* \w if|strong="G1437"\w* \w she|strong="G3306"\w* \w so|strong="G3779"\w* \w abide|strong="G3306"\w*, \w after|strong="G2596"\w* \w my|strong="G1699"\w* \w judgment|strong="G1106"\w*: \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w I|strong="G2504"\w* \w think|strong="G1380"\w* \w also|strong="G2504"\w* that I \w have|strong="G2192"\w* the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.
